title: Ep. 197 "Insulin And Orgasms" ft. Clare Marie Edgeman
description:
This week we're joined by Clare Marie Edgeman, author of "Finding F*ck Yes: A Memoir of Orgasms & Insulin". We discuss her unique experience with Type 1 Diabetes and how it has affected her dating and sex life.
